remarks: Absorption into a composition by joining with trace.  (Contributed by NM, 22-Jul-2013.)
statement:
trlcoabs.l $e |- .<_ = ( le ` K ) $.
trlcoabs.j $e |- .\/ = ( join ` K ) $.
trlcoabs.a $e |- A = ( Atoms ` K ) $.
trlcoabs.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
trlcoabs.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcoabs.r $e |- R = ( ( trL ` K ) ` W ) $.
trlcoabs $p |- ( ( ( K e. HL /\ W e. H ) /\ ( F e. T /\ G e. T ) /\ ( P e. A /\ -. P .<_ W ) ) -> ( ( ( F o. G ) ` P ) .\/ ( R ` F ) ) = ( ( G ` P ) .\/ ( R ` F ) ) ) $.
